creator: vgorincioi@nexui.com
text:
I cannot run ant because I receive the message: "Modern compiler is not 
available - using classic compiler" ... and fails. 
I have set the environment variables JAVA_HOME and ANT_HOME and JDK1.3.1 is 
properly installed as shown beneath.

When I check the ant version I get 1.3 dispite the fact that I installed ant1.4.
Could you please help me with this problem?
Thanks.

Slavic
